Reference

All functions

maximumAmbience() ambientContribMaximum()

Ambient contribution by maximum scaling

controlAmbience() ambientContribNegative()

Ambient contribution from negative controls

ambientContribSparse()

Ambient contribution by assuming sparsity

inferAmbience() ambientProfileBimodal()

Ambient profile from bimodality

estimateAmbience() ambientProfileEmpty()

Estimate the ambient profile from empty droplets

barcodeRanks()

Calculate barcode ranks

chimericDrops() removeChimericDrops()

Remove chimeric molecules

cleanTagCounts()

Clean a tag-based dataset

defaultDrops()

Call cells from their total number of UMIs

downsampleReads()

Downsample reads in a 10X Genomics dataset

testEmptyDrops() emptyDrops()

Identify empty droplets

emptyDropsCellRanger()

CellRanger's emptyDrops variant

encodeSequences()

Encode nucleotide sequences

get10xMolInfoStats()

Get 10x cell statistics

hashedDrops()

Demultiplex cell hashing data

makeCountMatrix()

Make a count matrix

read10xCounts()

Load data from a 10X Genomics experiment

read10xMolInfo()

Read the 10X molecule information file

removeAmbience()

Remove the ambient profile

swappedDrops() removeSwappedDrops()

Clean barcode-swapped droplet data

write10xCounts()

Write count data in the 10x format
